page.title: 13Chew Magna Playgroup
page.content: Chew Magna Playgroup, affiliated to the Pre-School Playgroup Association and registered by Avon County Council for up to 24 children, meets on the ground floor of the Old Schoolroom on Monday, Thursday and Friday mornings during school term time. At present, 18 children, aged between 3 and 5 years, attend. The object of playgroup is to help them gain confidence and to learn to mix socially and share with others. The two supervisors and two helpers, who all live in Chew Magna, hope to stimulate coordination through activities such as painting, cutting, sticking, jigsaws and building with blocks. The concept is to "learn through play" and time spent with dry and wet sand, water and playdough is very important, as is the home corner. The children soon settle in and enjoy every session.
